prompts: Create a rabbit-like Pokemon that excels in digging and has large ears.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon with strong legs and big, floppy ears.
Generate a Pokemon that can burrow underground and has a fluffy appearance.
Make a playful Pokemon that loves to hop around in grassy fields.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a bunny with brown fur and a bright yellow belly.
Design a cute but tough Pokemon that can dig tunnels quickly.
Show me a Diggersby-inspired Pokemon with a focus on agility and strength.
